category.name: Localization
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_language_localized_property_value_display
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of languages for displaying localized property values. Valid Values: cs_CZ - Czech de_DE - German en_US - English es_ES - Spanish fr_FR - French it_IT - Italian ja_JP - Japanese ko_KR - Korean ru_RU - Russian zh_CN - Chinese (as spoken in China) zh_TW - Chinese (as spoken in Taiwan)
